Quote.Author: Patton Oswalt
Quote.QuoteValue: We would not be here if humanity were inherently evil. We'd have eaten ourselves alive long ago

Quote.Author: Patton Oswalt
Quote.QuoteValue: It's like our country is being run by a bunch of bad alcoholic dads right now

Quote.Author: Patton Oswalt
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to drink this much to be as unfunny as you

Quote.Author: Patton Oswalt
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate all sidekicks

Quote.Author: Patton Oswalt
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not familiar with the metric system

Quote.Author: Patty Duke
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that all the important people in my life prior to 1982 were victimized by my illness

Quote.Author: Patty Duke
Quote.QuoteValue: I never did quite fit the glamour mode. It is life with my husband and family that is my high now

Quote.Author: Patty Duke
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew from a very young age that there was something very wrong with me

Quote.Author: Patty Duke
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality is hard. It is no walk in the park, this thing called Life

Quote.Author: Patty Duke
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't tell you what I had for breakfast, but I can sing every single word of rock and roll

Quote.Author: Patty Duke
Quote.QuoteValue: I tell people to monitor their self-pity. Self-pity is very unattractive

Quote.Author: Patty Duke
Quote.QuoteValue: My recovery from manic depression has been an evolution, not a sudden miracle

Quote.Author: Patty Duke
Quote.QuoteValue: Human beings have speculated about the relationship between inspiration and insanity for centuries

Quote.Author: Patty Duke
Quote.QuoteValue: I had been very close to Anne Bancroft when we worked together in The Miracle Worker

Quote.Author: Patty Duke
Quote.QuoteValue: I kind of like the position of being the fair-haired savior of my mother

Quote.Author: Paul Auster
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the sound a typewriter makes

Quote.Author: Paul Auster
Quote.QuoteValue: We are continually shaped by the forces of coincidence

Quote.Author: Paul Auster
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything can change at any moment, suddenly and forever

Quote.Author: Paul Auster
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not ready for everything, you're not ready for anything

Quote.Author: Paul Auster
Quote.QuoteValue: There's hope for everyone. That's what makes the world go round

Quote.Author: Paul Auster
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't put your feet on the ground until you've touched the sky

Quote.Author: Paul Auster
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing has always had that tactile quality for me. It's a physical experience

Quote.Author: Paul Auster
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm living in the present, thinking about the past, hoping for the future

Quote.Author: Paul Auster
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's a very good thing to leave your country and look at it from afar

Quote.Author: Paul Auster
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess the toughest things in translations are word play, which can never be reproduced exactly

Quote.Author: Paul Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: Show class, have pride, and display character. If you do, winning takes care of itself

Quote.Author: Paul Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: No coach has ever won a game by what he knows; it's what his players know that counts

Quote.Author: Paul Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: You never know how a horse will pull until you hook him to a heavy load

Quote.Author: Paul Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no substitute for guts

Quote.Author: Paul Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't give up at half time. Concentrate on winning the second half

Quote.Author: Paul Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: Never be too proud to get down on your knees and pray

Quote.Author: Paul Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: I ain't nothing but a winner

Quote.Author: Paul Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: It's nice to have the opportunity to play for so much money, but it's nicer to win it

Quote.Author: Paul Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: In a crisis, don't hide behind anything or anybody. They're going to find you anyway

Quote.Author: Paul Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning isn't everything, but it beats anything that comes in second

Quote.Author: Paul Cezanne
Quote.QuoteValue: The most seductive thing about art is the personality of the artist himself

Quote.Author: Paul Cezanne
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in a rainbow of chaos

Quote.Author: Paul Cezanne
Quote.QuoteValue: Genius is the ability to renew one's emotions in daily experience

Quote.Author: Paul Cezanne
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep good company - that is, go to the Louvre

Quote.Author: Paul Cezanne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll always be grateful to the public of intelligent amateurs

Quote.Author: Paul Cezanne
Quote.QuoteValue: The awareness of our own strength makes us modest

Quote.Author: Paul Cezanne
Quote.QuoteValue: Painting from nature is not copying the object; it is realizing one's sensations

Quote.Author: Paul Cezanne
Quote.QuoteValue: The world doesn't understand me and I don't understand the world, that's why I've withdrawn from it

Quote.Author: Paul Cezanne
Quote.QuoteValue: I have nothing to hide in art. The initial force alone can bring anyone to the end he must attain

Quote.Author: Paul Cezanne
Quote.QuoteValue: With an apple I will astonish Paris

Quote.Author: Paul Craig Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: For a country to be looted, its people's voice must be silenced

Quote.Author: Paul Craig Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no independent American print or TV media

Quote.Author: Paul Craig Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: As the U.S. is import-dependent, this will translate into higher domestic prices

Quote.Author: Paul Craig Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: In the Matrix in which Americans live, nothing is ever their fault

Quote.Author: Paul Craig Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: Once a country descends into evil, it doesn't emerge

Quote.Author: Paul Craig Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: Washington is a black hole into which all sanity is sucked out of government deliberations

Quote.Author: Paul Craig Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: Putin does not lie. When he says something, he means it

Quote.Author: Paul Craig Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: Washington's impulsive use of power is a danger to America and to the world

Quote.Author: Paul Craig Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: The real Social Security crisis is that the government does not have the money to redeem its IOUs

Quote.Author: Paul Craig Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: If all countries are exceptional, the word loses its meaning

Quote.Author: Paul Dano
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you sometimes have to go hit rock bottom before you can grow and rebuild as a person

Quote.Author: Paul Dano
Quote.QuoteValue: In tragedy, it's hard to find a good resolution; it's not black and white: it's a big fog of gray

Quote.Author: Paul Dano
Quote.QuoteValue: I love cereal. I eat several bowls a day, mostly a few late at night

Quote.Author: Paul Dano
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that one of the strangest things about being an actor is, it's almost freelance work

Quote.Author: Paul Dano
Quote.QuoteValue: I've definitely been in ruts, and I think having some kind of perseverance is important

Quote.Author: Paul Dano
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like tight pants on guys

Quote.Author: Paul Dano
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes we fall in love with the idea of a person and have trouble seeing the real thing

Quote.Author: Paul Dano
Quote.QuoteValue: The world of the homeless is a tough and interesting world

Quote.Author: Paul Dano
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Brooklyn; it's a part of who you are

Quote.Author: Paul Dano
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Little Miss Sunshine' was really important to me

Quote.Author: Paul Farmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing about rights is that in the end you can't prove what should be considered a right

Quote.Author: Paul Farmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't think of a better model for Haiti rebuilding than Rwanda

Quote.Author: Paul Farmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody should be interested in access to primary and secondary education for everybody

Quote.Author: Paul Farmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to do the human rights thing is to do the right thing medically

Quote.Author: Paul Farmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people talk about Haiti as being the graveyard of development projects

Quote.Author: Paul Farmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel it's part of my job to make the problems of the poor compelling

Quote.Author: Paul Farmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean we grew up in a TB bus and I became a TB doctor

Quote.Author: Paul Farmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I would say that, intellectually, Catholicism had no more impact on me than did social theory

Quote.Author: Paul Farmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not an austere person

Quote.Author: Paul Farmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm one of six kids, and the eight of us lived for over a decade in either a bus or a boat

Quote.Author: Paul Feig
Quote.QuoteValue: Bad women's comedies are made by men who didn't consult enough women

Quote.Author: Paul Feig
Quote.QuoteValue: Every director should take an acting class

Quote.Author: Paul Feig
Quote.QuoteValue: I always feel in improv that nothing is ever as good once it's repeated

Quote.Author: Paul Feig
Quote.QuoteValue: What you want is the thing that critics love and audiences love, but that's the hardest thing to do

Quote.Author: Paul Feig
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a standup comedian, which is kind of like writing and directing yourself

Quote.Author: Paul Feig
Quote.QuoteValue: You can never have a thousand percent batting average on jokes - it's just never going to happen

Quote.Author: Paul Feig
Quote.QuoteValue: With a suit, even if you're having a nervous breakdown, you still look like you're in charge

Quote.Author: Paul Feig
Quote.QuoteValue: We didn't used to be so precious about women in comedy back in the old days

Quote.Author: Paul Feig
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing worse than the sequel that's a letdown from the first movie

Quote.Author: Paul Feig
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever you wear, you have to own it. Make it yours

Quote.Author: Paul Gosar
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need to be lectured by the Pope about climate change

Quote.Author: Paul Gosar
Quote.QuoteValue: I think pressure gets to people when it appears they're trying to cover things up

Quote.Author: Paul Gosar
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish my brother well. We agree to disagree, but he is a good man. He is my brother

Quote.Author: Paul Gosar
Quote.QuoteValue: You're not going to find me cringe from my record

Quote.Author: Paul Gosar
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership has a price

Quote.Author: Paul Gosar
Quote.QuoteValue: Do you understand about water in the West? Whiskey's for drinking; water's for fightin' over

Quote.Author: Paul Gosar
Quote.QuoteValue: I know Gov. Palin is a classy lady and has her head on straight

Quote.Author: Paul Gosar
Quote.QuoteValue: If the Pope spoke out with moral authority against violent Islam, I would be there cheering him on

Quote.Author: Paul Gosar
Quote.QuoteValue: Aren't we supposed to be standing for something instead of falling for everything?

Quote.Author: Paul Gosar
Quote.QuoteValue: MAVNI was never intended to be utilized for the benefit of illegal aliens

Quote.Author: Paul Haggis
Quote.QuoteValue: We give you characters we'd feel very comfortable judging, and then go: 'Oh yeah? Watch this'

Quote.Author: Paul Haggis
Quote.QuoteValue: As artists, we have to be brave. If we aren't brave, we aren't artists

Quote.Author: Paul Haggis
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to have empathy, knowledge and compassion for your characters if you're a writer

Quote.Author: Paul Haggis
Quote.QuoteValue: As a general rule, I don't plan to travel with my Oscars, but we may have to make an exception

Quote.Author: Paul Haggis
Quote.QuoteValue: We're trying to reinvent Bond. He's 28 - no Q, no gadgets

Quote.Author: Paul Haggis
Quote.QuoteValue: Every 10 years, I know less about love and relationships. The smarter I get, the less I know

Quote.Author: Paul Haggis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a deeply broken person, and broken institutions fascinate me

Quote.Author: Paul Haggis
Quote.QuoteValue: My one guiding rule for success in the film world would be, be careful of your friends

Quote.Author: Paul Haggis
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought 'The King's Speech' was great

Quote.Author: Paul Haggis
Quote.QuoteValue: The wonderful thing about Clint is you can never second guess how he is going to react to anything

Quote.Author: Paul Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Personality has power to uplift, power to depress, power to curse, and power to bless

Quote.Author: Paul Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: In the clashes between ignorance and intelligence, ignorance is generally the aggressor

Quote.Author: Paul Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Ideas have unhinged the gates of empires

Quote.Author: Paul Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Motherhood is at its best when the tender chords of sympathy have been touched

Quote.Author: Paul Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Many obstacles to the expansion of good will have presented themselves

Quote.Author: Paul Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Segregation never brought anyone anything except trouble

Quote.Author: Paul Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Ignorance is a menace to peace

Quote.Author: Paul Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Individuals and nations owe it to themselves and the world to become informed

Quote.Author: Paul Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: One's religion is one's own possession and he has a right to it

Quote.Author: Paul Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: The very strength of a nation eventually proves to be its weakness

Quote.Author: Paul Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Golf is a game in which you yell 'fore,' shoot six, and write down five

Quote.Author: Paul Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Now you know the rest of the story

Quote.Author: Paul Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: If 'pro' is the opposite of 'con' what is the opposite of 'progress'?

Quote.Author: Paul Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Like what you do, if you don't like it, do something else

Quote.Author: Paul Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: When your outgo exceeds your income, the upshot may be your downfall

Quote.Author: Paul Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I am fiercely loyal to those willing to put their money where my mouth is

Quote.Author: Paul Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Retiring is just practicing up to be dead. That doesn't take any practice

Quote.Author: Paul Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never seen a monument erected to a pessimist

Quote.Author: Paul Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-government won't work without self-discipline

Quote.Author: Paul Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: In times like these, it helps to recall that there have always been times like these

Quote.Author: Paul Hawken
Quote.QuoteValue: The first rule of sustainability is to align with natural forces, or at least not try to defy them

Quote.Author: Paul Hawken
Quote.QuoteValue: All is connected... no one thing can change by itself

Quote.Author: Paul Hawken
Quote.QuoteValue: What we are missing, utterly and completely, in this government is accountability

Quote.Author: Paul Hawken
Quote.QuoteValue: The self-owned and -operated business is the freest life in the world

Quote.Author: Paul Hawken
Quote.QuoteValue: We are the only species on the planet without full employment. Brilliant

Quote.Author: Paul Hawken
Quote.QuoteValue: Business is destroying the world, with flair, expertise, and panache

Quote.Author: Paul Hawken
Quote.QuoteValue: A local company has more accountability

Quote.Author: Paul Hawken
Quote.QuoteValue: In short, industrialism is over

Quote.Author: Paul Hawken
Quote.QuoteValue: Trees are being saved because of the Kindle

Quote.Author: Paul Hawken
Quote.QuoteValue: You can print money to bail out a bank, but you can't print life to bail out a planet

Quote.Author: Paul Hollywood
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has a favourite cake, pastry, pudding or pie from when they were kids

Quote.Author: Paul Hollywood
Quote.QuoteValue: My first job at the bakery was jamming doughnuts

Quote.Author: Paul Hollywood
Quote.QuoteValue: Crumpets I make myself. I love crumpets. You can't beat a good home-made crumpet

Quote.Author: Paul Hollywood
Quote.QuoteValue: Making cake is one of the easiest things in the world

Quote.Author: Paul Hollywood
Quote.QuoteValue: Since I was a kid, baking has been part of my life

Quote.Author: Paul Hollywood
Quote.QuoteValue: Baking is therapy

Quote.Author: Paul Hollywood
Quote.QuoteValue: My own preferred fitness regime is to use my bicycle

Quote.Author: Paul Hollywood
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything that has more buttercream than it does cake is going to be a no-no for me

Quote.Author: Paul Hollywood
Quote.QuoteValue: I love evangelising about baking and passing the word on, and I will carry on doing that

Quote.Author: Paul Hollywood
Quote.QuoteValue: I think baking's far easier than cooking, and because of that, it's more approachable

Quote.Author: Paul Keating
Quote.QuoteValue: The great curse of modern political life is incrementalism

Quote.Author: Paul Keating
Quote.QuoteValue: When the Berlin Wall came down the Americans cried, 'Victory,' and walked off the field

Quote.Author: Paul Keating
Quote.QuoteValue: In the end, rational policy is always good

Quote.Author: Paul Keating
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Australia has to be a country which has the 'Welcome' sign out

Quote.Author: Paul Keating
Quote.QuoteValue: I always believed in burning up the government's political capital, not being Mr Safe Guy, you know?

Quote.Author: Paul Keating
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to use the Australian idiom to its maximum advantage

Quote.Author: Paul Keating
Quote.QuoteValue: The United States being in Asia is unambiguously a good thing for the region

Quote.Author: Paul Keating
Quote.QuoteValue: The G7, just a European centric show, an Atlantic show, is fundamentally finished

Quote.Author: Paul Keating
Quote.QuoteValue: One tires of combat, although I can still throw a punch, you know

Quote.Author: Paul Keating
Quote.QuoteValue: Politicians come in three varieties: straight men, fixers, and maddies

Quote.Author: Paul Lynde
Quote.QuoteValue: Sandwiches are wonderful. You don't need a spoon or a plate!

Quote.Author: Paul Lynde
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was adamant in his disapproval of my interest in show business

Quote.Author: Paul Lynde
Quote.QuoteValue: A room is like a stage. If you see it without lighting, it can be the coldest place in the world

Quote.Author: Paul Lynde
Quote.QuoteValue: I was obsessed with being rich and famous

Quote.Author: Paul Lynde
Quote.QuoteValue: I think basically an actor is a salesman

Quote.Author: Paul Lynde
Quote.QuoteValue: I sang in the choir for years, even though my family belonged to another church

Quote.Author: Paul Lynde
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm Liberace without a piano

Quote.Author: Paul Lynde
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I had the nerve not to tip

Quote.Author: Paul Lynde
Quote.QuoteValue: A closet full of wire hangers can be the most dangerous place in the world

Quote.Author: Paul Lynde
Quote.QuoteValue: If I ever completely lost my nervousness I would be frightened half to death

Quote.Author: Paul McCartney
Quote.QuoteValue: Think globally, act locally

Quote.Author: Paul McCartney
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't work at being ordinary

Quote.Author: Paul McCartney
Quote.QuoteValue: But you know, as a kid I would have thought of a vegetarian as a wimp

Quote.Author: Paul McCartney
Quote.QuoteValue: It's time to end the cruel slaughter of whales and leave these magnificent creatures alone

Quote.Author: Paul McCartney
Quote.QuoteValue: My so-called career is a haphazard thing

Quote.Author: Paul McCartney
Quote.QuoteValue: Buy, buy, says the sign in the shop window; Why, why, says the junk in the yard

Quote.Author: Paul McCartney
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the past. There are parts of the past I hate, of course

Quote.Author: Paul McCartney
Quote.QuoteValue: There are only four people who knew what the Beatles were about anyway

Quote.Author: Paul McCartney
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't take me seriously. If we get some giggles, I don't mind

Quote.Author: Paul McCartney
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not religious, but I'm very spiritual

Quote.Author: Paul Mooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't change the past, but one person can change the future - anything can happen

Quote.Author: Paul Mooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm as American as apple pie

Quote.Author: Paul Mooney
Quote.QuoteValue: People think you're crazy if you turn money down... people worship money

Quote.Author: Paul Mooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I have nothing to do with racism in America; it was here when I got here

Quote.Author: Paul Mooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm passionate about what I do. I'd be naive to be passive

Quote.Author: Paul Mooney
Quote.QuoteValue: You white folks see UFOs in your dreams. You don't hear about Martians in Harlem

Quote.Author: Paul Mooney
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're happy with what you're doing, then you don't get bored

Quote.Author: Paul Mooney
Quote.QuoteValue: People ask me, when was my best time? I always say, 'Today.'

Quote.Author: Paul Mooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I have a mental nappy attitude

Quote.Author: Paul Mooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I do celebrate anything with freedom in it, you know

Quote.Author: Paul Newman
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always a character actor. I just looked like Little Red Riding Hood

Quote.Author: Paul Newman
Quote.QuoteValue: You only grow when you are alone

Quote.Author: Paul Newman
Quote.QuoteValue: Show me a good loser and I will show you a loser

Quote.Author: Paul Newman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't have enemies, you don't have character

Quote.Author: Paul Newman
Quote.QuoteValue: Newman's second law: Just when things look darkest, they go black

Quote.Author: Paul Newman
Quote.QuoteValue: Money won is twice as sweet as money earned

Quote.Author: Paul Newman
Quote.QuoteValue: Newman's first law: It is useless to put on your brakes when you're upside down

Quote.Author: Paul Newman
Quote.QuoteValue: The star of oil and vinegar and the oil and vinegar of the stars

Quote.Author: Paul Newman
Quote.QuoteValue: So you wound up with Apollo. If he's sometimes hard to swallow. Use this

Quote.Author: Paul Newman
Quote.QuoteValue: People stay married because they want to, not because the doors are locked

Quote.Author: Paul Prudhomme
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need a silver fork to eat good food

Quote.Author: Paul Prudhomme
Quote.QuoteValue: When I am done with this meal you can have my life. It is heaven

Quote.Author: Paul Prudhomme
Quote.QuoteValue: We didn't do wrong things because we didn't want to embarrass our parents

Quote.Author: Paul Prudhomme
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think life is to be taken too seriously. Take it too seriously, and it'll getcha

Quote.Author: Paul Prudhomme
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in America. I'm one of those silly flag wavers

Quote.Author: Paul Prudhomme
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just here and I'm doin' the best I can. If you don't understand that, then what can I do?

Quote.Author: Paul Prudhomme
Quote.QuoteValue: Have fun. Do something nobody else had done before, or has done since

Quote.Author: Paul Prudhomme
Quote.QuoteValue: Cajun is country food by farmers and fisherman that arrived in Louisiana from Acadiana, Canada

Quote.Author: Paul Prudhomme
Quote.QuoteValue: I opened a restaurant that had nothing but California wines

Quote.Author: Paul Prudhomme
Quote.QuoteValue: What I think and what the world thinks is totally different

Quote.Author: Paul Ricoeur
Quote.QuoteValue: The logic of validation allows us to move between the two limits of dogmatism and skepticism

Quote.Author: Paul Ricoeur
Quote.QuoteValue: This is perhaps the most profound meaning of the book of Job, the best example of wisdom

Quote.Author: Paul Ricoeur
Quote.QuoteValue: If the Resurrection is resurrection from the dead, all hope and freedom are in spite of death

Quote.Author: Paul Ricoeur
Quote.QuoteValue: Narrative identity takes part in the story's movement, in the dialectic between order and disorder

Quote.Author: Paul Ricoeur
Quote.QuoteValue: Testimony gives something to be interpreted

Quote.Author: Paul Ricoeur
Quote.QuoteValue: The text is a limited field of possible constructions

Quote.Author: Paul Ricoeur
Quote.QuoteValue: Wisdom finds its literary expression in wisdom literature

Quote.Author: Paul Ricoeur
Quote.QuoteValue: But myth is something else than an explanation of the world, of history, and of destiny

Quote.Author: Paul Ricoeur
Quote.QuoteValue: So long as the New Testament served to decipher the Old, it was taken as an absolute norm

Quote.Author: Paul Ricoeur
Quote.QuoteValue: Testimony demands to be interpreted because of the dialectic of meaning and event that traverses it

Quote.Author: Paul Ryan
Quote.QuoteValue: Hey, I'm a Catholic deer hunter, I am happy to be clinging to my guns and my religion

Quote.Author: Paul Ryan
Quote.QuoteValue: We will not duck the tough issues, we will lead

Quote.Author: Paul Ryan
Quote.QuoteValue: Borrowing and spending is not the way to prosperity

Quote.Author: Paul Ryan
Quote.QuoteValue: We are looking for bipartisan solutions not partisan rhetoric

Quote.Author: Paul Ryan
Quote.QuoteValue: Here's the problem if you keep raising tax rates: You slow down economic growth

Quote.Author: Paul Ryan
Quote.QuoteValue: And to this day, my Mom is my role model

Quote.Author: Paul Ryan
Quote.QuoteValue: We will not spend four years blaming others, we will take responsibility

Quote.Author: Paul Ryan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never seen opponents so silent about their record, and so desperate to keep their power

Quote.Author: Paul Ryan
Quote.QuoteValue: People have a constitutional right to have semiautomatic rifles

Quote.Author: Paul Ryan
Quote.QuoteValue: Women are to be championed and revered, not objectified

Quote.Author: Paul Samuelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Good questions outrank easy answers

Quote.Author: Paul Samuelson
Quote.QuoteValue: What we know about the global financial crisis is that we don't know very much

Quote.Author: Paul Samuelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Economics has never been a science - and it is even less now than a few years ago

Quote.Author: Paul Samuelson
Quote.QuoteValue: An intriguing paradox of the 1990s is that it isn't called a decade of greed

Quote.Author: Paul Samuelson
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not easy to get rich in Las Vegas, at Churchill Downs, or at the local Merrill Lynch office

Quote.Author: Paul Samuelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Every good cause is worth some inefficiency

Quote.Author: Paul Samuelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Funeral by funeral, theory advances

Quote.Author: Paul Samuelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Economics is a choice between alternatives all the time. Those are the trade-offs

Quote.Author: Paul Samuelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Let those who will - write the nation's laws - if I can write its textbooks

Quote.Author: Paul Samuelson
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't think of a president who has been overburdened by a knowledge of economics

Quote.Author: Paul Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something about the sound of a train that's very romantic and nostalgic and hopeful

Quote.Author: Paul Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody can do bad work, but not everybody does good work

Quote.Author: Paul Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: Who am I to blow against the wind?

Quote.Author: Paul Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: Listen to the sound of silence

Quote.Author: Paul Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: We've survived by believing our life is going to get better

Quote.Author: Paul Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is an island in the setting sun, But proof is the bottom line for everyone

Quote.Author: Paul Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is forever; music should grow and mature with you, following you right on up until you die

Quote.Author: Paul Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: Why am I so soft in the middle when the rest of my life is so hard?

Quote.Author: Paul Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: Without Arthur's voice, I never would have enjoyed that success

Quote.Author: Paul Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a big error to think that because you like somebody's work, you're going to like him

Quote.Author: Paul Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're in a position to have gotten so much, the gift at this point is giving back

Quote.Author: Paul Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: Credibility is someone else's idea of what I should be doing

Quote.Author: Paul Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: I tend to fly a bit under the radar

Quote.Author: Paul Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: Youth is incredible because you really do feel invincible

Quote.Author: Paul Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing I can say is consistent in all my paintings is vivid color
